New Records: Virat Kohli broke Sachin Tendulkar's record with his 50th ODI century
Mohammed Shami took five wickets, the first bowler to do so in the World Cup
Daryl Mitchell scored 134, the highest individual score in a World Cup semi-final
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took five wickets to dismiss New Zealand
Ravindra Jadeja took a crucial catch to dismiss Daryl Mitchell
The match had high-pressure moments with key wickets falling late
Post-Match Reflections: Nasser Hussain praised Mohammed Shami's performance
The win boosted India's morale ahead of the World Cup final
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a significant milestone for India
